title: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-Based Online Mathematics Project for Strengthening Intellectual Disability Manager Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and fundamental digital device usage abilities
context.additional_context: Intellectual disability support program for individuals with administrative/management work experience. Requires personalized content tailored to individual learning paces and cognitive levels

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic arithmetic operations with 80% accuracy in budget calculation projects.
Learners can interpret graphs with 90% accuracy when writing business reports.
Learners can complete task schedules by collaborating with peers at least 75% of the time in the 4th-week project evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
